description: unsigned; six scenes of monthly festivals, a.(January) Water Fight and Bathing House, b.(February) T-fukuji Temple Nehane Festival, c.(March) Cockfight, d.(April) Woman Dancing, Wisteria Tree, Family Picnic, e.(May) Mock Battle of Boys, f.(June) Gion Festival
inscription:
Box cover, outside:

御巻物　二軸　[handscrolls, 2]

Box inscription (inside): 

寛政九巳五月精心院様為御(進 or 遺)物納候　　
[5th month of 1797 (Kansei 9), gift of Seishin\'in]

*Seishin\'in is someone in the house of Tokugawa Tsunayoshi

Attached paper below, inside box

詞書
尊朝親王御筆 [Calligraphy by Soncho Shinno]
画
住吉具慶筆 [Painting by Sumiyoshi Gukei]
とみえもうす候
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: Pleasures of the Twelve Months, part one [of a pair]
